pages.text:
1011 Atlantic Blvd., Atlantic Beach, FL
Monday: Closed
Tuesday - Friday: 4pm - 10pm
Saturday & Sunday: 12p - 8p
Tour Our Space
About Us
ABOUT THIS
community
taproom
Small
Relaxed
Low-Key
Special
Fun
Family Friendly
Pet Loving
Sports Showing
ALL-AROUND HAPPY PLACE TO HANG OUT!
WHY COME HANG?
Why not?
Well, if you don't like kids or dogs maybe this place isn't for you. Not saying you've got to love them, but if you have zero like of them, there's LOTS of other options in our area :). This taproom is accepting of ALL kinds. It's a small hidden-gem of a place to meet old friends and new.
​
Other Perks:
Parking will never be a problem!
Lots of food options near by to bring in!
Football, baseball, basketball, F1 Racing, Golf and whatever other sports you dig will always be available!
Great people are always on hand!
Delicious beverage options for all!
Contact Us
About us
we are the millers
Let us introduce ourselves. John Miller (aka. Dad, Dadda, Mill) Massachusetts transplant that met his amazing wife (that's me) Samantha in 2006 when he moved to the Tampa Bay area. Sam Miller (aka. Samantha, Mom, Momma, Badass Mamma-jamma) also a northeast transplant that left New Jersey for the sunshine state to attend the University of Tampa in 2001 and never looked back.
​
We relocated to St. Augustine Beach in 2008 to be closer to family. In 2011, we migrated a bit north to the Beaches area of Jacksonville. We now reside "across the ditch" on the north-end of the Intracoastal West/San Pablo area.
​
And then there are our amazing Half-Pint Porch OGs (Original Gangstas), Paxton and Parker. Paxton is 8 and attends NBE and Parker is 4 living her best pre-school life.
​
What We Love: Being outside, our Friends and Family, our Community, socializing and just living the beach lifestyle.
​
The Taproom
the taproom
For locals by locals
Hoppy Porch is a place for our community to come together, relax, mingle, meet and drink (we do have NA options). You never know but we are proof that you can meet your next best friend at Hoppy Porch.
kid & animal friendly
Known to us as Half-Pints (kids) and Porch-Pups (self explained) yes, it's totally cool and acceptable to bring your "baby" to the "bar". This is a place of kindness and acceptance, a no judgement zone!
Casual& FUn atmosphere
Whether you are coming off the beach, sandy and salty, or stopping in for a few drinks before a nice dinner out, you are welcome. A no-frills, fun, easy place to catch up with friends or meet new ones.
grab a drink,
have a seat
With over 40 taps we have something for everyone. Sit at the bar, on our Front Porch, or find a spot on one of our comfy couches. We don't have food but grab a snack from the Porch Pantry or order in food from any of the amazing restaurants nearby. Outside food is always welcome.
To play, press and hold the enter key. To stop, release the enter key.

MEETNGS & PRIVATE EVENT SPACE
We are thrilled to offer our space for Meetings and Private events!
Our space is comfy, cozy and casual with a beachy vibe.
Basic details available below but please reach out for a custom quote.
Request a Quote
event
types
Business Meetings
Host your Leadership Team, Management Team or any other group for an off-site meeting (Ex. Quarterly Planning, Annual Planning, Brainstorming Session, etc.)
​
Available Monday - Friday for 1/2 Day or Full Day rental.
Private Parties
Treat your special guests to an evening at Hoppy! Holiday gatherings, special birthdays, client appreciation parties, and more.
​
Available all Sunday and Monday evenings and limited availability for Thursday - Saturday evenings.
DETAILS
BUSINESS MEETINGS
private parties
Availability: Monday - Friday
​​
1/2 Day - Pick any 4 hour time period between 9a to 3p​
Full Day - 9am to 3pm
Capacity:
Recommend headcount of 1 to 15
Seating:
Our space has multiple configurations of seating options utilizing our furniture or outfitting the space with the traditional large round with foldout chairs.
Catering:
​D
iscounted catering from Sierra Grill and a few other locally owned and operated businesses.
​​
Equipment:
We have five 65" TVs for displaying presentations
​
Dry Erase White Board with Markers
Will accommodate other requests needs as available​
Add-Ons:
Coffee and/or Breakfast Bar
​
Drink Cooler (Sodas and waters of choice)
1hr Private Happy Hour with Bartender (3p-4p)
​
Availability:
Every Sunday & Monday evening
​
Thursday - Saturdays limited availability, will only offer 1 of each per month on a first come, first serve basis.
Normal events run 3 to 4 hours starting at 7pm
Capacity:
Recommend headcount of 1 to 35 inside​
Additional capacity outside for 15
Total Capacity of 50 max
Catering:
Allow us to coordinate your catering needs as we have options from many locally owned and operated businesses.
​
Support staff will order and setup food as requested
Decorating:
Access to the establishment 1 hour prior to your event and for 30 minutes after for breakdown​
Support staff will help in your setup
Entertainment: ​
Allow us to help coordinate a DJ or single acoustic live entertainment options. ​
Request a Quote
Request a quote
Like what you see? Get in touch to learn more.

Event Details
Date of Event
